mapper.sql: id, phone_id, first_type, seconde_type, consumable_id, description, color
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM repair_type WHERE id = #{ id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO repair_type ( id, phone_id, first_type, seconde_type, consumable_id, description, color ) VALUES ( #{ id}, #{phoneId}, #{firstType}, #{secondeType}, #{consumableId}, #{description}, #{color} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE repair_type
phone_id = #{phoneId},
first_type = #{firstType},
seconde_type = #{secondeType},
consumable_id = #{consumableId},
description = #{description},
color = #{color},
WHERE id = #{ id}
